channel.title: California on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in California on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: After 8.8 Magnitude Quake Near Russia, Tsunami Waves Reach Japan, Hawaii and California
item.description: Several people were injured, but none gravely, and no major damage has been reported so far.

item.title: After 8.8 Magnitude Quake Near Russia, Tsunami Waves Reach Japan, Hawaii and California
item.description: Several people were injured, but none gravely, and no major damage has been reported so far.

item.title: “It’s shocking”; Massive raw milk outbreak from 2023 finally reported
item.description: The outbreak occurred in 2023–2024, but little information had been shared about it.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-driving cars.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-driving cars.

item.title: California backs down to Trump admin, won’t force ISPs to offer $15 broadband
item.description: “Complete farce”: State lawmaker says US threatened to block broadband funding.

item.title: Why It’s Taking LA So Long to Rebuild After the Wildfires
item.description: Reforming California’s environmental rules is only a small step to rebuilding Los Angeles after the fires in January.

item.title: Why It’s Taking LA So Long to Rebuild After the Wildfires
item.description: Reforming California’s environmental rules is only a small step to rebuilding Los Angeles after the fires in January.
